A0048.title: Complaint and Reporting Channel
A0048.definition: A channel or mechanism provided to users for submitting complaints, reports, or feedback about issues.
A0048.description: Such channels are typically designed to help users resolve problems encountered while using services or purchasing goods, and also help maintain social order and regulate industry behavior.
A0048.limitation: Detection of violations depends on user reports, and user reports may be inaccurate.
